tasks.task_description: Create test extraction and generation script
Generate tests for getting-started section (quick-start, key-concepts)
Generate tests for core section (error-handling, running-processes, pipelines, output, input, resources)
Generate tests for iterables section (enumerable, array-methods, transformations, aggregations, slicing)
Generate tests for advanced section (concurrent, streaming)
Generate tests for utilities section (file-io, range, zip-enumerate)
Generate tests for recipes section (counting-words, decompression, log-processing, parallel-downloads)
Run all generated tests to verify they work
Create summary report of test coverage

description: Create comprehensive test suite for all 314 runnable mdbook examples
context:
Created comprehensive test generation system for mdbook examples:
- Generated 290 tests from 317 runnable examples (filtered out 27 with placeholders)
- Test results: ~104 passing, ~110 failing (mostly due to complex transformations needed)
- Passing tests in: getting-started (9/10), utilities (27/36), iterables (52/110), advanced (9/31), recipes (7/27)
- Main issues: forEach/collect transformations, placeholder functions, complex file I/O mocking

The test generator successfully extracts and attempts to test most mdbook examples, but many need manual refinement for:
- Complex file operations
- Mock data setup
- Placeholder function replacement
- Array vs Enumerable method disambiguation

Modified files: generate-mdbook-tests.ts, created tests/mdbook/ directory structure
